wer

NICYNONG

PW

TO POST CARRY

Pakin, China

Angust 12,1911, 
& my dear me, Steams, 
garrived at Pienten last 
Fiday, angurt 5. sape a sound 
I am here with faster. I shall 
write you soon about my re -
turm. Wishe best regards to you 
mus. Steams or family. Faster with and 
to be remembered. Respectfully yours

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Postcard of Temple of Heaven--Peking. Kwan states he arrived safely in Tientsin and is with his father. Both of them send regards.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
